course_description: A description of the pathophysiology of endocrine conditions, including disorders of the pancreas, thyroid, adrenal glands, and pituitary gland; endocrinologic diseases from the molecular to the clinical level; common endocrine diseases from neonate to geriatric patient; surgical aspects of endocrine diseases; imaging techniques used to evaluate endocrine diseases; laboratory & clinical research methods in the endocrine system; endocrine conditions affecting females and reproduction.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 5964, Section #: 000, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: D. Schulman, Status: Closed
